name: KILL ON SIGHT: Dark Iron Dwarves
tooltip:
KILL ON SIGHT: Dark Iron DwarvesLevel 52

Venture to Blackrock Depths and destroy the vile aggressors!

Warlord Goretooth wants you to kill 15 Anvilrage Guardsmen, 10 Anvilrage Wardens and 5 Anvilrage Footmen. Return to him once your task is complete.

Requirements:
- Anvilrage Guardsman x 15
- Anvilrage Warden x 10
- Anvilrage Footman x 5
